Class Coffer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Coffer

public class Coffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deposit
Model component that stores Resources with no restrictions

    • Coffer

      public Coffer()

    • Coffer

      public Coffer​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> coffer)
      Parameters:
      coffer - custom constructor used to create a coffer object in the light model. The Coffer object is build client side after receiving via json file the HashMap with Resource as key and Integer as value corresponding to the model's coffer content
